title: RACING EVENT detail page Â» Successor
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to always see the RACING EVENT that followed in the championship\
So I can quickly revisit the whole season
description:
* The RACING EVENT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected RACING EVENT.
* The RACING EVENT is presented with its name and primary information.
* The RACING EVENT contains a link to its detail page.
* The RACING EVENT has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACING EVENT connected to the RACING EVENT then the section is not displayed at all.
